messages.title: Delivering real change for Woking residents
messages.content: Through thick and thin, local people know they can rely on Rosie Sharpley to stand up for local people.

messages.title: Rosie is fighting for real change in Britain.
messages.content: Top priorities include creating new jobs, tackling crime and making sure every child gets a good education.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Making sure every child gets a good education

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Lib Dems can beat the Conservatives here!

issues.education: Making sure every child gets a good education
issues.health: The NHS should be safe either - top Tories want to break up the NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: Rosie has a track record of helping local people over the last 21 years. She's been a local councillor helping people with their day to day problems. She’s also worked on the front line as a nurse in the NHS helping local people.

politicalExperience.achievements: Helping people with their day to day problems.

quotes.text: Key Tory MPs backed call to dismantle NHS
We've lived through this mistake for 60 years now
quotes.source: Top Tory Dan Hannan on the NHS

images.caption: Rosie Sharpley wants to see more practical measures to tackle crime and anti-social behaviour.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Rosie always puts people first above politics. She is the best choice to be our next MP.
